general.name: Ahmed Othman
general.headline: Software Developer
about: Iam a software engineer with experience in full-stack development (MERN Stack, React Native)

seeking challenging opportunities to leverage my skills. Committed to delivering high-quality solutions and contributing to innovative projects. Passionate about continuous learning and growth in software engineering principles and technologies.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Joined the MERN stack team as a React Developer, building web applications and dashboards using React and Next.js, as well as developing mobile apps with React Native.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: As a Software Developer in an agile environment, I specialize in front-end development for web applications using React.js and Next.js, and mobile app development with React Native, delivering responsive and user-friendly interfaces

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Full Stack Web Developer (MERN) at Communication and Technology Center - Helwan University, Develope Web Application for The University

education.subject: Computer Engineering
education.description: Grade: Very Good With Honor 81.27% | Graduation Project Grade : Excellent.

education.subject: Front End & Cross-Platform Development
education.description: Front End & Cross Platform Mobile Development.

projects.name: Two Column Portfolio
projects.shortDescription: A simple two-column portfolio template that is easy and quick to customize for your own purposes. Mobile friendly.
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio template built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features a clean two-column layout, mobile-friendly design, and easy customization options. Perfect for developers, designers, and professionals looking to showcase their work.

projects.name: E-Commerce Mobile App
projects.shortDescription: Cross-platform e-commerce application with modern UI and seamless shopping experience.
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce mobile application built with React Native. Includes user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, and order management. Features smooth animations, offline support, and push notifications.

projects.name: Task Manager Desktop
projects.shortDescription: Cross-platform desktop task management application with advanced features.
projects.description: A powerful desktop task manager built with Electron and React. Features include project organization, time tracking, team collaboration, and advanced reporting. Supports Windows, macOS, and Linux with native system integration.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: Interactive weather dashboard with real-time data and beautiful visualizations.
projects.description: A comprehensive weather dashboard application providing real-time weather data, forecasts, and interactive maps. Features include location search, weather alerts, historical data analysis, and customizable widgets.
